intro: Eriolaena glaberrima, commonly known as the smooth eriolaena, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many economically important plants. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, clustered flowers with four petals. It typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. The fruit is a small, dry capsule that contains several seeds.
